root.name: Real Soccer 2010
root.description: 800 Nintendo DSi PointsDescriptionReal Soccer is back for the most exciting season yet! Choose from more teams than ever and compete in new stadiums around the world. Lead your team to victory on the field and make tactical decisions as the coach. - 245 teams in 8 leauges with real player names thanks to the FIFPro license - Use the inner camera or outer camera to take pictures and turn them into a custom ball, team flag or a player's face - 3 new stadiums with even more detail - Challenge friends via DS Wireless Play for the most intense tournaments and endless fun
